diff_hunk:
@@ -16,6 +16,43 @@
 from . import grad
 
 
+class Reduction:
+    @staticmethod
+    def to_enum(reduction):
body: It seems unnecessary to split `to_enum` and `get_reduction_constant` into two methods. The functionals will be called a lot (if used), so let's reduce the python code as much as possible by using one method that takes in all three args.
